name: Alley Hunter
desc: An intricate, opulent longbow. It once belonged to a gentleman thief who was never caught.

values.desc: While the character equipped with this weapon is in the party but not on the field, their DMG increases by <color=#99FFFFFF>2%</color> every second up to a max of <color=#99FFFFFF>20%</color>. When the character is on the field for more than 4s, the aforementioned DMG buff decreases by <color=#99FFFFFF>4%</color> per second until it reaches 0%.

While the character equipped with this weapon is in the party but not on the field, their DMG increases by <color=#99FFFFFF>2.5%</color> every second up to a max of <color=#99FFFFFF>25%</color>. When the character is on the field for more than 4s, the aforementioned DMG buff decreases by <color=#99FFFFFF>5%</color> per second until it reaches 0%.

While the character equipped with this weapon is in the party but not on the field, their DMG increases by <color=#99FFFFFF>3%</color> every second up to a max of <color=#99FFFFFF>30%</color>. When the character is on the field for more than 4s, the aforementioned DMG buff decreases by <color=#99FFFFFF>6%</color> per second until it reaches 0%.

While the character equipped with this weapon is in the party but not on the field, their DMG increases by <color=#99FFFFFF>3.5%</color> every second up to a max of <color=#99FFFFFF>35%</color>. When the character is on the field for more than 4s, the aforementioned DMG buff decreases by <color=#99FFFFFF>7%</color> per second until it reaches 0%.

While the character equipped with this weapon is in the party but not on the field, their DMG increases by <color=#99FFFFFF>4%</color> every second up to a max of <color=#99FFFFFF>40%</color>. When the character is on the field for more than 4s, the aforementioned DMG buff decreases by <color=#99FFFFFF>8%</color> per second until it reaches 0%.
